name: MEC Fast-Track Rolling 90L - Unisex
description:
Roll smoothly and quietly, with a bit of low-key elegance. The much-loved Fast Track Rolling 90L features streamlined moulding and padded tub-style panels that extend up the sides for extra protection. Large, rugged wheels make for rumble-free transit. An expansion zipper gives you additional capacity for souvenirs or those times you want to bring a few extra outfit options. And when it's time to come home, the whole Fast Track Rolling set nests together for easy storage in small apartments and gear closets.Made of polyester with a PU coating and a DWR finish for excellent water resistance.Burly 1000-denier high-tenacity polyester in high-wear areas adds durability.Reinforced honeycomb plastic tub base and 3mm foam lining throughout bag provide protection from bumps and drops.Lockable zippers on the main compartment keep your stuff secure.Expansion zipper adds another 10L of storage. External compression straps let you cinch down the load.Large internal zippered mesh pocket and cinch straps keep you organized.External zippered pocket with key clip holds quick-access items.Business card/ID label slot ensures you pick up the right bag off the luggage carousel.Push-button telescoping pull handle.80mm wheels are rugged polypropylene and polyurethane.Fabric grab handles on side and top for moving onto buses or conveyor belts.Heavy-duty plastic kick plate on bottom stands up to the rigours of travel.The Fast Track Rolling 60L bag and Fast Track Rolling 40L Carry On (sold separately) nest inside for easy storage.

        Sustainability
